FullText:
Frog, Killer

This frog stands partially erect and has dark green skin fading to light on its underbelly.


Killer Frog

CR 1

XP 400
N Small animal
Init +1; Senses low-light vision, scent; Perception +3
DEFENSE
AC 14, touch 12, flat-footed 13 (+1 Dex, +2 natural, +1 size)
hp 6 (1d8+2)
Fort +4, Ref +3, Will -1
OFFENSE
Spd 10 ft., swim 30 ft.
Melee 2 claws +2 (1d4+1 plus grab), bite +2 (1d4+1)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Special Attacks rake (2 claws +2, 1d4+1)
STATISTICS
Str 12, Dex 13, Con 14, Int 2, Wis 9, Cha 6
Base Atk +0; CMB +0 (+4 grapple); CMD 11 (15 vs. trip)
Feats Improved Natural Attack (claw)
Skills Acrobatics +5 (+9 jumping), Perception +3, Stealth +9, Swim +12; Racial Modifiers +4 Acrobatics (+8 jumping), +4 Stealth
ECOLOGY
Environment temperate or warm land, aquatic, and underground
Organization pack (2-5), cluster (4-7), or swarm (3-18)
Treasure none

Killer frogs are similar to their dire cousins, except that they stand partially erect and use their front claws as well as their bite. Killer frogs are created by an evil mutation of dire frogs through a practice thought to be known only to the worshipers of Tsathogga. Killer frogs, being more humanoid in appearance, do not have adhesive tongues.
AbilitiyScores: Str 12, Dex 13, Con 14, Int 2, Wis 9, Cha 6
Name: Killer Frog
Environment: temperate or warm land, aquatic, and underground
